'merged_at': None}, 'body': 'For regexes, case is important because \b and \B are exact opposites (similar with \d and \D, \w and \W, etc.)

In the future, whether a filter should be case-sensitive or treated as a string versus regex match can be handled by marking those explicitly as separate attributes.', 'reactions': {'url': 'https://api.github.com/repos/afterxleep/Bouncer/issues/19/reactions', 'total_count': 0, '+1': 0, '-1': 0, 'laugh': 0, 'hooray': 0, 'confused': 0, 'heart': 0, 'rocket': 0, 'eyes': 0}, 'timeline_url': 'https://api.github.com/repos/afterxleep/Bouncer/issues/19/timeline', 'performed_via_github_app': None}, 'comment': {'url': 'https://api.github.com/repos/afterxleep/Bouncer/issues/comments/1030671146', 'html_url': 'https://github.com/afterxleep/Bouncer/pull/19#issuecomment-1030671146', 'issue_url': 'https://api.github.com/repos/afterxleep/Bouncer/issues/19', 'id': 1030671146, 'node_id': 'IC_kwDOC5B2Ic49bssq', 'user': {'login': 'donaldchai', 'id': 14955603, 'node_id': 'MDQ6VXNlcjE0OTU1NjAz', 'avatar_url': 'https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/14955603?v=4', 'gravatar_id': '', 'url': 'https://api.github.com/users/donaldchai', 'html_url': 'https://github.com/donaldchai', 'followers_url': 'https://api.github.com/users/donaldchai/followers', 'following_url': 'https://api.github.com/users/donaldchai/following{/other_user}', 'gists_url': 'https://api.github.com/users/donaldchai/gists{/gist_id}', 'starred_url': 'https://api.github.com/users/donaldchai/starred{/owner}{/repo}', 'subscriptions_url': 'https://api.github.com/users/donaldchai/subscriptions', 'organizations_url': 'https://api.github.com/users/donaldchai/orgs', 'repos_url': 'https://api.github.com/users/donaldchai/repos', 'events_url': 'https://api.github.com/users/donaldchai/events{/privacy}', 'received_events_url': 'https://api.github.com/users/donaldchai/received_events', 'type': 'User', 'site_admin': False}, 'created_at': '2022-02-05T18:04:21Z', 'updated_at': '2022-02-05T18:04:21Z', 'author_association': 'NONE', 'body': '#22 doesn't fix the problem.

The problem is that by immediately lowercasing the `phrase` upon storage, there's no way to use regex meta characters such as `\B` and `\W`.

As far as I can tell, the unconditional lowercasing still occurs in the "develop" branch: https://github.com/afterxleep/Bouncer/blob/a75890837fab5b0cfaf757c0b77222cce907584f/Bouncer/Models/FilterStore/FilterStore.swift#L36

This isn't a huge issue for me, but may be surprising for someone in the future.', 'reactions': {'url': 'https://api.github.com/repos/afterxleep/Bouncer/issues/comments/1030671146/reactions', 'total_count': 0, '+1': 0, '-1': 0, 'laugh': 0, 'hooray': 0, 'confused': 0, 'heart': 0, 'rocket': 0, 'eyes': 0}, 'performed_via_github_app': None}}

The app is stuck on the welcome/tutorial screen, despite me going into the OS-wide settings and enabling SMS filtering.  (The screenshot below will make it clear why I thought that's all I needed to do.)

----

Based on reading the code:

https://github.com/afterxleep/Bouncer/blob/28b3fa157c5f3b75a344459f55cf4203841594f0/Bouncer/App/BaseView.swift#L17

https://github.com/afterxleep/Bouncer/blob/28b3fa157c5f3b75a344459f55cf4203841594f0/Bouncer/Views/Tutorial/TutorialContainerView.swift#L35

it seems like there's some sort of button that one is supposed to tap to get past this screen:

https://github.com/afterxleep/Bouncer/blob/28b3fa157c5f3b75a344459f55cf4203841594f0/Bouncer/Views/Tutorial/TutorialView.swift#L96

but the problem is that this button doesn't show up.

The iPhone screen resolution is 1136 Ã— 640 and it seems like the TutorialView simply does not fit.  This is what it looks like on my screen:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/14955603/148852291-fe687d9c-3247-4d39-8584-2174e75b0486.png)
